overview: Poor Skin has no idea what to do with her life when she graduates, so Prof. Gunn offers her some guidance. Riley is a good girl with bad luck to end up in detention. luckily the school badass will show her the ropes. The substitute teachers can't seem to focus with smoking hot student, Rylie sitting up front. The quarterback likes to welcome all the new cheerleaders onto the squad, giving Chastity more reason to give it her best. Ashlynn sneaks into class to steal some exams, but she forgot to make sure the janitor wasn't doing his rounds.
tagline: Top porn stars in real life scenarios!
title: Corrupt Schoolgirls
